profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
profile.description: A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rules.rule:
<<<<<<< HEAD A Level A conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as A. A Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B. conformance == "B" || conformance == "A" ======= The PDF/A conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema. conformance == "B" >>>>>>> refs/remotes/veraPDF/integration
The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of "B" for PDF/A-1b conforming file. conformance
ISO 19005-1:2005 6.7.11
